p: A total of 139 patients with acute febrile illness (AFI) were studied from January to March 2016. Patients were grouped by ages, and the group between 20 to 44 years old corresponding at 58.3% of cases, followed by the group between 5â€“19 years old with 21.6% cases, and patients older than 45 years old were at 15.8% of the cases. Furthermore, no differences were observed between genders ( Table 2).
